Guard Curtis: If you are thinking of going to the ruins, I can give you an errand that you will find rewarding. Just recently, I spoke with Samed, who lives near the edge of the village... He asked me to refer a few skilled friends to him, when guards or mercenary soldier troops were dispatched near the ruins. I myself have helped him out a few times. The job is a little unpleasant, but... the pay is good. What do you say, do you want to give it a try?
